content: Consumable Items are found throughout Black Myth: Wukong's chapters. These come in the form of additional drinks, which you can consume on the fly, providing a host of different buffs and stat boosts. From removing elemental effects, boosting resistance, supercharging your health, or granting bonus damage, each one can change the tide of a fight or boss battle, provided you use it at the right time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Consumable_Items.md', within the main section titled 'Consumable Items'.
The content is as follows:
Consumable Items are found throughout Black Myth: Wukong's chapters. These come in the form of additional drinks, which you can consume on the fly, providing a host of different buffs and stat boosts. From removing elemental effects, boosting resistance, supercharging your health, or granting bonus damage, each one can change the tide of a fight or boss battle, provided you use it at the right time.
